name: Brass Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walk, 15 ft. burrow, 60 ft. fly
description: The Brass Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon noted for its bright brass scales and fiery breath. It has a playful demeanor and enjoys tricks.
memorable: Known for its fiery breath and sleep-inducing gas, making it a versatile opponent.
goals: To play tricks on travelers and guards while showcasing its cunning and magical abilities.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other chromatic dragons or within dragon lairs.
environment: Typically found in warm, hilly regions or near molten glass formations.
strengths: Immune to fire damage and equipped with deadly breath weapons.
weaknesses: Lower hit points compared to more mature dragons, making it vulnerable to strong attacks.
attacks: Utilizes bite and claw attacks, alongside powerful breath weapons for crowd control.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapons, allowing it to deal fire damage or induce sleep in foes.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, enhancing its ability to detect threats in close proximity.
skills: Skilled in arcana, history, nature, and stealth, showing a good level of intelligence and awareness.
additional_information: Self-sufficient, requiring minimal food and water each day.
Possesses a Pounce ability to knock foes prone for additional attacks.
Can perform a Multiattack for increased damage output.
Features a Fire Breath that can deal area damage.
Capable of incapacitating foes with its Sleep Breath.
test_queries: medium dragon that breathes fire and gas
dragon with the ability to knock foes prone
fiery dragon wyrmling that loves tricks
